parameters.text:
=Provide me trending keywords for the topic below.
{{ $json.Topic }}

parameters.content:
### ✅ **🔹 Section 1: Trigger & Input Setup**

**Nodes:**
1️⃣ **Schedule Trigger** ⏰
2️⃣ **Edit Fields** ✏️

**What Happens Here:**

* **⏰ Schedule Trigger:** This node automatically starts the workflow at a defined time (e.g., every week on Monday). No manual start needed!
* **✏️ Edit Fields:** Here, you define the **Topic** you want to research. In your case, you set it to something like **“AI Blogging”** — but you could change this to *any* topic (e.g., *Digital Marketing*, *Remote Work*, *Crypto*, etc.).

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* Just set the day & time in the **Schedule Trigger** (e.g., weekly, daily).
* In **Edit Fields**, enter your target topic — this is the seed for the whole keyword research process.

---

### ✅ **🔹 Section 2: AI Agent & Search Tool**

**Nodes:**

* **AI Agent 🤖**

  * **Sub-nodes:**

    * **OpenAI Chat Model 💬**
    * **MCP Search Tool 🔍**
    * **Structured Output Parser 🧩**

**What Happens Here:**

* **🤖 AI Agent:** This is the smart brain of your workflow.

  * It uses your Topic input to generate a prompt.
* **💬 OpenAI Chat Model:** This sub-node calls an LLM (like GPT) to craft the perfect search query or interpret results.
* **🔍 MCP Search Tool:** This searches live data sources for real-time trending keywords related to your Topic.
* **🧩 Structured Output Parser:** This ensures the AI’s output is converted into *clean JSON* (e.g., `{"topic": "AI Blogging", "trending_keywords": [...]}`) so your next nodes can read it easily.

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* You don’t need to write any code — just make sure the AI prompt returns structured JSON like the example:

  ```json
  {
    "topic": "Your Topic",
    "trending_keywords": [
      {
        "keyword": "Example Keyword",
        "description": "Short description"
      }
    ]
  }
  ```
* The **Structured Output Parser** keeps your data clean for Google Sheets.

---

### ✅ **🔹 Section 3: Save to Google Sheets**

**Node:**

* **Google Sheets 📄**

**What Happens Here:**

* This node takes the structured data and appends each keyword + description into your Google Sheet.
* Every week, your sheet grows with new, fresh trending keywords — no manual copy-paste needed.

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* Connect your Google Sheets account once.
* Pick the target sheet & columns.
* The workflow does the rest: every time it runs, new rows are added automatically!

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🚀 **n8n Workflow: Weekly AI Keyword Research & Report**

This workflow automatically finds trending AI keywords and logs them into Google Sheets — fully automated, beginner-friendly, and no code!

---

### ✅ **🔹 Section 1: Trigger & Input Setup**

**Nodes:**
1️⃣ **Schedule Trigger** ⏰
2️⃣ **Edit Fields** ✏️

**What Happens Here:**

* **⏰ Schedule Trigger:** This node automatically starts the workflow at a defined time (e.g., every week on Monday). No manual start needed!
* **✏️ Edit Fields:** Here, you define the **Topic** you want to research. In your case, you set it to something like **“AI Blogging”** — but you could change this to *any* topic (e.g., *Digital Marketing*, *Remote Work*, *Crypto*, etc.).

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* Just set the day & time in the **Schedule Trigger** (e.g., weekly, daily).
* In **Edit Fields**, enter your target topic — this is the seed for the whole keyword research process.

---

### ✅ **🔹 Section 2: AI Agent & Search Tool**

**Nodes:**

* **AI Agent 🤖**

  * **Sub-nodes:**

    * **OpenAI Chat Model 💬**
    * **MCP Search Tool 🔍**
    * **Structured Output Parser 🧩**

**What Happens Here:**

* **🤖 AI Agent:** This is the smart brain of your workflow.

  * It uses your Topic input to generate a prompt.
* **💬 OpenAI Chat Model:** This sub-node calls an LLM (like GPT) to craft the perfect search query or interpret results.
* **🔍 MCP Search Tool:** This searches live data sources for real-time trending keywords related to your Topic.
* **🧩 Structured Output Parser:** This ensures the AI’s output is converted into *clean JSON* (e.g., `{"topic": "AI Blogging", "trending_keywords": [...]}`) so your next nodes can read it easily.

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* You don’t need to write any code — just make sure the AI prompt returns structured JSON like the example:

  ```json
  {
    "topic": "Your Topic",
    "trending_keywords": [
      {
        "keyword": "Example Keyword",
        "description": "Short description"
      }
    ]
  }
  ```
* The **Structured Output Parser** keeps your data clean for Google Sheets.

---

### ✅ **🔹 Section 3: Save to Google Sheets**

**Node:**

* **Google Sheets 📄**

**What Happens Here:**

* This node takes the structured data and appends each keyword + description into your Google Sheet.
* Every week, your sheet grows with new, fresh trending keywords — no manual copy-paste needed.

**How a Beginner Can Use This:**

* Connect your Google Sheets account once.
* Pick the target sheet & columns.
* The workflow does the rest: every time it runs, new rows are added automatically!

---

## 🌟 **Why This Workflow is Powerful**

✅ **Zero manual work:** You set the Topic once — the bot does the rest.
✅ **Always fresh data:** Pulls live trends with MCP Search + OpenAI.
✅ **Clean reports:** Your Google Sheet becomes a growing database of keyword ideas.
✅ **Beginner-friendly:** No coding, just drag & drop and simple JSON.

---

## 💡 **Next Steps**

* Want a fancy 📊 chart? Connect Google Sheets → Looker Studio to make dashboards.
* Want Slack updates? Add a Slack node after Google Sheets to get notified when new keywords arrive.
* Want multiple topics? Use a Google Sheet or Airtable to loop through multiple Topics automatically!

---
